body.p: The Grinder 2 and The Grinder 3 can be downloaded from SourceForge.net. They are packaged as a zip format files which you should expand using unzip, WinZip or similar.

tr.td: Java 2 Standard Edition 1.3.1, equivalent, or later
to build The Grinder from source
to check the formatting of changes you may make to The Grinder

body.p: Later versions of these packages should also work.

JSSE (Java Secure Socket Extension) is a standard part of Java 2 Standard Edition 1.4.1 and later. To simplify SSL and HTTPS configuration, JSSE is now required for The Grinder 3. Consequently you may find it easier to use J2SE 1.4.1 with The Grinder 3.
